docs.title: FleetFind Documentation
docs.text: Welcome to the documentation for FleetFind. This guide provides comprehensive information on how to use, install, and contribute to FleetFind.

docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: FleetFind is a powerful Django search utility that empowers you to seamlessly search across multiple models. It simplifies the process of searching for specific data within your Django project, providing a flexible and efficient solution.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Multi-Model Search: Easily search across different Django models simultaneously.
  • Flexible Configuration: Customize your search by specifying the models and fields to include.
  • Efficient Querying: Utilizes Django's QuerySet API for efficient and optimized searches.

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
To install FleetFind, use the following command:

```bash pip install fleetfind
